message: Hi Bob, I'm interested in selling this product. I believe it would be very valuable for you. I'm asking for $20,000 to start. What do you think?
I'm really interested in the product, but $20,000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. Would you be willing to consider that?
I understand your budget constraints, Bob, but $12,000 is significantly below its value.  How about we meet in the middle at $17,000?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but $17,000 is still a bit steep for me. I'm willing to go up to $14,000. Would you be willing to consider that?
